2101140.name: Resonance of the Ocean - Music Collection & Artworks
2101140.description:
Resonance of the Ocean - Music Collection & Artworks is a bundle of musics created by Yuji Ninomiya, composer and sound designer, and images that can be used for personal use, game streaming, and personal SNS accounts.

Musics included are as follows

- Resonance of the Ocean (Title)
- Jingle of the Tidal Wind (Stage Clear)
- Rushing Waves (Main Theme)

Images included are as follows

- Key art
- Logo ( transparent )
- Field background (cropped)
- Player and some effects ( transparent )
- Rough design during production

Because the game itself is free, the price is a little high for the amount of content. We hope you enjoy it as an extra content.
